SEARCH
Package user

Class Customer

java.lang.Object
user.User
user.Customer
public class Customer extends User
Represents a customer in the booking system. This class provides functionalities for a customer to interact with the system, including viewing and booking concerts, updating personal information, and viewing bookings.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Customer()
    Default constructor initializes customer with empty ID and name.

      public Customer()
      Default constructor initializes customer with empty ID and name.

  • Method Details

    • newCustomer

      public String newCustomer(String id, String psw, String path) throws FileNotFoundException, IOException
      Registers a new customer and adds their information to the system.
      Parameters:
      id - The customer ID to assign to the new customer.
      psw - The password for the new customer.
      path - The path to the file where customer data is stored.
      Returns:
      The unique number identifier of the new customer as a string.

    • customerMode

      public void customerMode(ConcertDetails concertDetails, BookingDetails bookingDetails, String bookingPath, FileLoad file) throws IOException, FileNotFoundException, InvalidLineException, InvalidFormatException
      Handles the customer mode operations allowing interaction with concert and booking details.
      Parameters:
      concertDetails - Details of all concerts available for booking.
      bookingDetails - Details of all current bookings.
      bookingPath - Path to the booking data file.
      file - Instance of FileLoad to handle file operations.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
      FileNotFoundException - If a required file is not found.
      InvalidLineException - If a line in any of the read files does not conform to the expected format.
      InvalidFormatException - If the format of the data in the files is invalid.

    • loopMenu

      public String loopMenu(ConcertDetails concertDetails, BookingDetails bookingDetails, Concert concert, String bookingPath, FileLoad file) throws IOException, FileNotFoundException, InvalidLineException, InvalidFormatException
      Provides a loop menu for customer operations like booking tickets and viewing concert details.
      Parameters:
      concertDetails - Details of all concerts.
      bookingDetails - Details of all bookings.
      concert - The current concert being interacted with.
      bookingPath - Path to the booking data file.
      file - Instance of FileLoad to handle file operations.
      Returns:
      A string indicating whether the customer is exiting the menu or continuing.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
      FileNotFoundException - If a required file is not found.
      InvalidLineException - If a line in any of the read files does not conform to the expected format.
      InvalidFormatException - If the format of the data in the files is invalid.

    • updateBookingDetails

      public BookingDetails updateBookingDetails(String bookingPath, FileLoad file) throws IOException, FileNotFoundException, InvalidLineException, InvalidFormatException
      Updates and returns the booking details after changes have been made, such as a new booking.
      Parameters:
      bookingPath - Path to the booking data file.
      file - Instance of FileLoad used for file operations.
      Returns:
      Updated booking details.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
      FileNotFoundException - If the booking file is not found.
      InvalidLineException - If a line in the booking file does not conform to the expected format.
      InvalidFormatException - If the format of the data in the booking file is invalid.
